attributes.action: Create a motorbike track in hull
attributes.additional_details: I think if this would done they would be less youths on the streets and less hassle with the police chasing off road bikes off parks or off the public roads
attributes.background: We would like the council to make a dirtbike track in hull to stop people from riding dangerously on the road with off road bikes endangering themselves and other

rejection.details:
Local decisions about approving new motorbike tracks are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
